channel.title: CVE Feed for Academy Software Foundation -- OpenEXR
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Academy Software Foundation -- OpenEXR

item.title: CVE-2023-5841|2024-08-02T08:14:24.651Z -- academy%20software%20foundation -- openexr
item.description: Due to a failure in validating the number of scanline samples of a OpenEXR file containing deep scanline data, Academy Software Foundation OpenEX image parsing library version 3.2.1 and prior is susceptible to a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability. This issue was resolved as of versions v3.2.2 and v3.1.12 of the affected library.
